name: Frozen Bubble - Snow Edition
description:
Frozen Bubble - Snow Edition is perfect game to play when you want to relax and clear your mind, share this awesome bubble popper thrill with family and friends and race for the highest score. Because smashing bubbles is absolutely free and totally addictive!
HOW TO PLAY
* Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop.
* Win points and reach high scores.
* Clear the board and win levels.
* Win enough points to earn at least one star.
* Beat all the challenges and win hard levels.
